forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 23C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 74F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High around 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 23C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 74F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 19C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 66F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
